social.Instagram¶

class social.Instagram(username)[source]¶

Scrape the data of an Instagram User

username¶

str – User’s username

id¶

str – User’s unique ID

name¶

str – User’s full name

biography¶

str – User’s biography

url¶

str – Linked site under user’s biography

followers¶

int – Number of accounts following the user

following¶

int – Number of accounts user is following

business_category_name¶

str – Name of business category

category_id¶

str – ID of business category

overall_category_name¶

str – Name of overall category

is_private¶

bool – Is the account private

is_verified¶

bool – Is the account verified

profile_pic_url_hd¶

str – URL to high defintion profile picture

connected_fb_page¶

str – Connected Facebook page

media_count¶

int – Number of posts by user

timestamp¶

int – Current UNIX epoch timestamp

shortcode_list¶

list – List of all shortcodes for a user

Examples

Contruct new object for @denimtears, gather media, do some analytics

>>> from cloudburst import social as cbs
>>> ig = cbs.Instagram("denimtears") # Build pseudo-database for user
>>> ig.download_profile_picture()
>>> ig.get_previews()
>>> ig.download_stories()
>>> ig.download_highlights()
>>> ig.download_thumbnails()
>>> ig.download_posts()
>>> print(f"First post: https://www.instagram.com/p/{ig.get_post_by_number(-1)}")
>>> print("Querying for keyword "acyde":")
>>> for shortcode, _ in ig.search_captions_by_keyword("acyde"):
>>>     print(f"    https://www.instagram.com/p/{shortcode}")
>>> print(f"Top tagged user: {ig.get_tagged_users()[0][0]}")
>>> print(f"Top tagged users in captions: {ig.get_tagged_users_in_captions()[0][0]}")
>>> print(f"Top hashtag: {ig.get_hashtags()[0][0]}")
>>> top_liked_post = ig.get_posts_by_like_count()[0]
>>> print(f"Most liked post: https://www.instagram.com/p/{top_liked_post[0]} ({top_liked_post[1]} likes)")
>>> print(f"Total lifetime likes: {ig.get_lifetime_like_count()}")
__init__(self, username)[source]¶

Constructor method

Parameters:username (str) – Any Instagram user’s username to query

Methods

__init__(self, username) Constructor method
download_highlights(self[, output_dir, …]) Download all highlights from an Instagram user in their highest quality
download_posts(self[, output_dir, progress_bar]) Download all posts from an Instagram user in their highest quality
download_profile_picture(self) Download an Instagram user’s profile picure in its highest quality
download_stories(self[, output_dir, …]) Download all stories from an Instagram user in their highest quality
download_thumbnails(self[, output_dir, …]) Download all posts from an Instagram user in their highest quality
get_hashtags(self) Get all hashtags (and the posts that use them) from a user, sorted by frequency
get_lifetime_like_count(self) Total number of likes a user has received
get_post_by_number(self, number) Get a post shortcode by number
get_posts_by_like_count(self) Sort posts by like count
get_previews(self[, mode, output_dir]) Get all media previews for a user
get_tagged_users(self) Get list of all users tagged in post
get_tagged_users_in_captions(self) Get list of all users tagged in captions
search_captions_by_keyword(self, keyword) Find all captions containing a queried keyword
